item.description:
Come on down and have some Cribbage fun and *VOTE* for your favorite skunking person !

And a big welcome to Joe and hope he comes back to win again :)

Missing you lots Gerrie and hope all is well and Sue you were missed too :(

Great seeing Dave, Laura, Bette, Karen, Trina, Teresa again and having some really
fun times playing cribbage with y'all !

So join us for Voting Day and together we can find out who our W*I*N*N*E*R*S are, but we already know it is US.....
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in the back room with our cribbage boards out and skunking someone!
item.name: Waltham Cribbage Meet Up and *VOTE* for your favorite person to SKUNK!
